item.title: Short animated novel OneRoom: Yui Hanasaka Memorial announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/short-animated-novel-oneroom-yui-hanasaka-memorial-announced-for-pc

  • PC

Due out on January 11, 2025 for 500 yen.

Publisher Laplacian and developer Sakasauma have announced OneRoom: Yui Hanasaka Memorial, an animated novel game allowing players to reexperience the story of short anime series OneRoom‘s main heroine, Yui Hanasaka. It will launch for PC via Steam on January 11, 2025 for 500 yen with English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese language support, and features 15 to 20 minutes of total play time.

The staff of OneRoom have also reunited to launch the new project, “PROJECT OneLeaf.” A new animation studio, “STUDIO OneRoom,” has been established to produce a completely new anime that continues from the previous series, as well as produce original content under the concept of “creating together with fans” through new forms of announcements and user participation projects.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

That pure love, that lovey-dovey moment again—.

A brand-new project from the beloved short anime series OneRoom has begun!

Introducing “PROJECT OneLeaf,” a completely new project where you can once again experience the story of the main heroine, Yui Hanasaka (voiced by MAO), from the OneRoom series in an innovative animated novel game!

About the OneRoom Series

The OneRoom series is known for its subjective viewpoint, where the viewer themselves is the protagonist, and it features special days spent with the heroines.

The series is in an omnibus format and depicts the unique and intimate relationships between the protagonist and the heroines. The first season aired in 2017, the second in 2018, and the third in 2020.

With charming characters by popular illustrator Kantoku, stunning animation, a story more profound than one might expect from a short anime, and meticulous attention to fetishistic details, the series became a huge hit.

Yui Hanasaka’s Story

Yui Hanasaka is the only heroine to appear in all seasons of the OneRoom series.

In the first season, she moves to Tokyo for her university entrance exams and meets the protagonist (you), who is her neighbor in the same apartment. Their bond grows as they spend special days together, and they eventually fall in love.

In the second season, we follow their lives as university students and lovers. Though they argue and face insecurities, their relationship strengthens.

In the third season, the couple faces a major turning point as they transition into working adults.

In this game, you can revisit the story from the second season and experience the third season’s events.

Key Features

  • A new type of animated novel game that directly adapts the original anime. It combines subjective viewpoint animation with novel game elements, creating a higher level of immersion.
  • Includes new monologues written by the original anime scriptwriter, giving you the chance to experience Yui’s emotions and enjoy the story from a different perspective than the anime.
  • As a clear reward, you can view precious materials such as concept art, illustration collections, and original sketches.
  • The game is a short story with a total playtime of 15 to 20 minutes.
  • The game also serves as an experimental project designed to expand the possibilities of the new project. We encourage players who are interested to provide feedback and support the future of the project.
  • We permit the streaming of gameplay videos, but kindly ask that you refrain from sharing clear reward videos or images.
